text: Hi again. The issue is fixed now. Thanks to whoever at HubSpot fixed this. Its working again :slightly_smiling_face:
Here are what i get when i try this endpoint <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/>
I've tried it enough, what's wrong here ?

<@U03M8LD7G90> thank you for checking!
We had a very hard time to explain the issue to HubSpot support, but they escalated to the techs in the end. Glad they solved the issue. Less glad they disrupt a 2000$/month feature without anyone noticing. :rage:
Thynk You. We did write some JS and it seems to work.
